players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Alice's death on Night 1 means we have one mafioso among the three of us remaining. We need to be very careful with our vote today since with only 3 players left, one wrong vote could end the game."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately to win this game."

You: "Charlie is clearly lying and trying to frame me! Think about it Diana - if Charlie was really the detective and knew I was mafia, why would he reveal this so openly? A real detective would be more strategic. Charlie must be the mafioso trying to eliminate me!"
Charlie: remained silent.

Diana: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, you should have more information. What was Alice's role that you investigated? And why reveal your detective status so boldly when the mafia could have killed you tonight?"

You: "Diana raises excellent points! Charlie's claim makes no sense - a real detective wouldn't expose themselves so recklessly on Day 1. He's clearly the mafioso trying to frame me before we figure it out. We should vote Charlie!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
